newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Medic Computer cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Medic Computer cut to hold.

text.p: -- Rodman & Renshaw Inc said Tuesday it lowered its rating on Medic Computer Systems Inc to neutral from buy.
-- The move comes after Medic Computer said Monday its first quarter 1997 earnings would not meet analysts' expectations.

-- "Management has indicated that it has a healthy sales pipeline and is on track to meet expectations for the remainder of the year," Rodman & Renshaw wrote in a research note. "We believe, however that there are still some uncertainties as to how the company will more accurately forecast quarterly revenues."
-- Medic Computer shares were up 1-3/8 at 14-1/2 Tuesday.
